meanings.definition: A hobby or activity pursued for pleasure or relaxation.
meanings.sent1: Her avocations include painting and gardening.
meanings.sent2: Many people have avocations like knitting or fishing.
meanings.sent3: His avocations of birdwatching and stamp collecting keep him busy.
meanings.sent4: In her spare time, she immerses herself in avocations like photography.
meanings.sent5: The peacefulness of her avocations brings joy to her life.

meanings.sent1: His avocations as a carpenter supplement his main income.
meanings.sent2: Avocations such as tutoring can provide extra income.
meanings.sent3: Juggling his avocations of teaching and writing can be challenging.
meanings.sent4: Her avocations in music add a harmonious touch to her life.
meanings.sent5: The dedication he shows in his avocations is truly admirable.
